content.detailedDescription: While jogging the morning of september 29, 2015 in churchill county, city of fallon, nevada, i witnessed a bright, crescent shaped light descend from a 45 degree angle from my position within the sky. the light gave off a haze, like a street lamp. the light quickly descended behind a residential house, without a flash or sign of deceleration. no sound unusual sounds were present during this sighting. the house the light disappeared behind was approximately one-fifth a mile away. unable to determine distance from observed light, or approximate landing area. an airport searchlight is located to the northeast of the sighting location. witnessed the searchlight before and after sighting, and the searchlight was not the cause of the sighting. cloud cover was minimal to non-existent this night. witnessed venus towards to the northeast of the sighting location.
content.summary: Crescent shaped light descended, becoming obscured behind residential structure.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my garden and heard low-flying loud jets.  when i looked up to see if i could see the jets, that's when i saw the ufo.  this sighting has been witnessed by many people in town and an anonymous photo was taken.
content.summary: Heard loud low flying jets, looked up in sky, saw sphere object come from west turn abruptly and go north.

content.detailedDescription: I was filming venus with a camcorder as it was rising in the east.  at 5:48 am, while filming, an object appeared that did not look like a plane, helicopter, or satellite. it did not move like any of these either. it appeared, while filming, just to the left of venus, and moving towards it at a slight descent. then after about 10 second it disappeared before reaching venus.  i have worked in astronomy four four years at the state observatory in oregon.  if i were to compare it to anything, i would have to say it looked more like a natural satellite orbiting jupiter (through a 2.5 inch refractor) than a star. one has to ask: "what is a natural satellite doing appearing, moving towards venus, then disappearing? it looks to me, like light reflected off a metallic surface.
content.summary: Filmed venus 5:48 am, white speck appeared left to it moving towards it, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out the report with witness on the phone, at mufon hq., by field investigator l. flechtner on 9/30/15.
______________________________________________________________________
on a thursday night i went to walk the dogs at about 9:20. i looked up at the sky and saw a vertical, star colored, line hovering above the power lines. i called my wife and daughter out to see the vertical white light. while we were watching it moved under the power lines and moved very slowly towards us and hovered over the house. my daughter and i stayed outside and then we noticed up to 12 more of the vertical lines moving very slowly towards the east. then we noticed some square bottomed craft with a set of three white lights inside a set of three white lights on the bottom of the craft. we could tell some structure was above the bottom but could not see it. we also saw some red lights but couldn't tell where they were on the craft. the red and white lights were blinking. all the craft were slowly moving east ward. most of the lines were higher than a helicopter, but not as high as a commercial airplane. i see those all the time. the square bottomed craft appeared to be 40 yds across
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On a thursday night i went to walk the dogs at about 9:20. i looked up at the sky and saw a vertical, star colored, line hovering above the power lines.

content.detailedDescription:
Having a cig outside with girlfriend and sister 
wierd sound
missile as it had no wings
straight flight path overhead
quite shocked wife got cats in she thought it was a missile 
sped off
content.summary: Tic tac shaped blue plasma from rear.

content.detailedDescription: Around 10:30 p.M. on 9/28/15 my daughter bobbi and i and her daughter ahmya went outside. it looked overcast and the "moon" seemed weird. i started video taping the "moon". bobbi started saying that the "faces" was freaking her out. the clouds moving around the moon looked weird. i seemed to video tape for only a few minutes or so. next thing you know after coming in and looking at my video, bobbi and ahmya went upstairs to fold clothes. the clouds passing the "moon" reminded me of bats flyign around. it just didn't look right. next thing you know it was midnight. it just didn't seem like that much time had passed. she came downstairs and we were feeling weird. my head feeling weird. i was freezing and shivering and bobbi was hot. she felt weird also. i think it was after she went back upstairs for bed that i went back out to video tape more. when i went to review that video, it was like it was completely erased. today is 9/30/15 and it seems like weird things have been happening. cell phones cutting out, my computer went on the blink. my second video from 9/28/15 all the sudden was on my phone last night, 9/29/15. tried to call my daughter to tell her about my video all the sudden appearing after 24 hours but i couldn't get ahold of her, cell phones not working. this morning 9/30/15 i was sleeping around 7-9 a.M. and had weird dreams. one was me out on my porch and i was completely surrounded by some kind of light that was paralyzing. i didn't and haven't been sleeping well. today i have enhanced my video and every second stopped it and took pictures. well someone has some explaining to do!!!!!!!!! these objects that are in the stills of my video are, how you say, "odd". i really think our government and nasa, air force, and anyone else covering up this bizarre stuff should be required to let the people know what is going on. all this month there have been weird things going on and many nights this month i have been out taking pics and videos and things are showing up. i'm including many frame after frame shots. you tell me what you think. no wonder bobbi was freaking about the faces. (having a hard time uploading the video) will try to send to mufon and they can add it to this case number)
content.summary: Thought we were watching the clouds pass the "moon" weird night.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving in fort worth tx. it was getting really dark from the storm so my 10 year old decided he would video the storm. he put his phone to record and caught this object in the video. he noticed the pink purple light and said he caught a ufo. my son was showing it to a friend last week and his friend saw it. my son would always fast forward it to the light part so he missed the ufo. but i reviewed it several times and it does look like a ufo. very pretty colors,it comes out of the clouds send goes back in a few times. you can view and let us know. 
i am really curious and my son is excited. he is showing everyone now.
content.summary: My son was recording the storm and caught this what appears to be a ufo in the clouds. we didn't t see it until he was showing another child the pink flourescent lights and then they saw the object before the light beam appeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east down anderson mill towards austell rd when i saw something that looked like it was on fire, falling out of the sky. it exploded and lit up the sky as it fell and left a visible trail. it seemed to be pretty close to the ground, and disappeared quickly into the tree line, but i did not hear a crash like i expected to. i am unsure if this was a ufo or simply an extraordinary sighting of a meteor burning up in the atmosphere or a satellite falling out of the sky. i hope that maybe others in the area got a better look at it and might know what it was better than i.
content.summary: Bright like an orb and on fire, lit up the sky as it fell.

content.detailedDescription: I was  driving  to the village then to my left above new house that have benn  bilt recentle  i saw that big i mene realy big object hovering . i am familiar with the phenome i watch al kind  of show concerning ufo  .Wen i saw it like i say i was driving  then i say to myself  what the f@@@  then i stop my car i did not even have time to stop my car the object took off like i have never ever seen anating took off in a instant the object was the size of a tic tac no smoke no noise nothing just from being  a big thing rigth there in front of me to the zize of a tic tac in the sky .The object was pitch black  no  light  no window . it look exactley  like  the drawing of a unibo that the german were working on  during the   2 world  war but the exception  undernet  in stead of having  3 bal  like thing  it have only 1 big . it was cloudy and wen it got to the zize of a tic tac it just vanish under a clood . it was gone .All this happen within 8 or 10 sec. i did not have time to  be scarde or anyting else at this moment . i remenber telling a friend of it in the evening  and it was strange itwas like i was not shure anymore if i saw it  if it had happen.                                                                                                      please excuse my english  writting i am french
content.summary: Uniboo like obeject  kind of wath the german were working on in 2 world war

content.detailedDescription: It was august 28 about 2 am. it was the same day there was an eclipse/blue moon. my friends were driving me home. on my way there i saw lights in the sky occasionally. i then saw a ufo with blue lights in the air next to a house. i told everyone in the car but they just laughed but one of my friends saw something blue but he wasn't really paying attention. i was really frustrated that they didn't believe me. i got dropped off home. when i went inside i heard a strange noise coming from a block away. i decided to go check it out since i knew i saw a ufo.  i walked over to where i was hearing the noise. it was coming from an alley in front of my friends house. i saw a ufo! i got scared so i went inside my friends house without permission. i stayed there watching it from the door. this ufo was a different one from what i saw earlier. this one was white and it was shaped weird. and had different color lights around it and on the bottom it seemed to look like a orange and blue light/flame sort of thing. i was so in shock. 1st thing i thought was too get someone here to see it! i called my friend that lived there but they didn't answer. i decided to go closer to get a better view of it. as i walked to the road all it's lights turned off! the only thing you could see was the orange/blue light flame thing coming from the bottom of it. i got kinda scared and started to back away. then it just stayed there and so i went closer to it again. and this time it started to fade! like it was disappearing but i could see where it was. i ran back to my friends house. i looked and it was there again. i tried calling my other friend but she wouldn't answer. this was now like 2:30 in the morning. i stepped outside my friends house and stayed by his garage. all of a sudden i see lights to my right. i look over and i couldn't believe what i had seen. it was an alien! but it didn't look like the type of aliens people picture. this looked like a super advanced technological robot. it was a dark grey/silver with like a stick body and it had two lights as eyes. and it was moving in one spot. i stood there for a bit observing it. it would just move it's head. i decided to get a better look at it by moving away from the fence and so i did. i walked slowly towards the road and that's when it saw me and froze! it's lights turned off and it stood in one position and did not move. i backed away to were there fence was in between us. it remained that way. i went again and this time it became invisible. i went back to the fence and when i looked at it, it was there again. but still remained frozen. it knew i was watching it. i couldn't believe what i was seeing. i was in shock scared excited and nervous all at the same time. i needed to have someone see what i was seeing because i knew nobody would believe me. so i decided to try to call more people to see if anyone would pick up! i called a friend. he answered! i told him to come asap. he asked why what happened?? i told him not to ask and to hurry and come. he came and parked in front of my house. i slowly ran over there hoping the thing wouldn't see me. i kept looking back to see if i would stay there and it did. i went up to my friend and from where we were i pointed all the way where the thing was standing by the alley in front of a garage. i asked if he sees a silver thing over there and he says yes. that's when i told him what it was and everything i saw. he looked at me and was like shut up. i said i was being dead serious. he just stared at it. he looked scared. i told him i could take him to where he could see the ufo but he didn't want too! he was scared but he just didn't say it. all he said was no it's nothing. and that he didn't see anything over there. i'm like you just said you saw the silver thing over there now you can't say you didn't because you already admitted to it. i tried to convince him to come to see the ufo in the alley he didn't want to but at the end he did. i took him to the side of my friends house and pointed at the alley. i told him if he saw the blue and orange lights and he said yes i'm like okay that's the ufo. it was kinda distant from us. but he said those are probably lights. he was trying to convince himself that it was something else. he went back to his car and i followed. i'm like wow you're really not going to do this with me? i thought i could count on you. he said no sorry. i'm like why???? you saw everything. are you really that scared? he said yeah..I'm scared of aliens and all that stuff. i'm like okay i understand i guess i'm just going to find someone else. so he left. i went back to where i was and just watched. i was so amused at what i was seeing. my phone was dying so i went back to my house to charge it. then i went back to where i was without my phone. everything was still there. i was by the fence seeing this thing just frozen there. then all of the sudden i see it's eyes (two lights on the head) start turning on. it was blinking and it looked like it was just waking up. and it just started to move its head around and his arms up like it was stretching. it then looked worried and sad. i thought. is it lost or stuck here? i just stayed there and observed it. i went a bit forward again and i think it saw me trying to get a better view of it so it turned off again and froze. i was upset that my friend didn't want to help with anything. i really needed someone to come. i went back inside to grab my phone to see who i could call. i called my friend and she picked up! i told her to hurry and come and so she did. i did the same and pointed at the silver thing and asked if she saw that she said yes in like okay are you sure you see it. it's right there. my finger pointing at it. she said yes what about it. and i told her everything. she came with me to show her the ufo. shes like are you sure that's it. this was now like 330 am. she said what if maybe it's lights from another house or something. i'm like nope it's not. let's go check it out?? she said that i was crazy and went back to her car. i followed. i'm like please!! she's like we can go in the car but i'm not walking over there. i'm like fine but it knows and it will probably go invisible. so we went and drove around the block and passed by and then it disappeared and that's when my friend was like wow i give you props for this one. then she dropped me back off and left. she wasn't much help. i needed someone to have interest in it and explore this with me or i needed to get it on camera or something because i knew nobody would believe me if i told them. i just wanted evidence of what i was seeing. i then thought of my moms video recorder! i 1st went back to see if it was there and it was. so i went to go get my moms video recorder and i went back and tried recording it but it was hard to tell since it was dark out but it had the bottom lights on so you could see that part of the ufo. and i couldn't get the alien robot thing since it was off and it was dark. i then left. and i regret not doing anything else about it. i regret not doing more further research or anything. because i knew this was a once in a life time opportunity. i maybe be the 1st one to ever see this. maybe nobody will believe my story. i was indecisive on wether i should do a report on a ufo signing page or something because what i seen was crazy and maybe nobody will believe me. they will think its a joke or something. but what i seen was real and i may be the 1st one to ever see what i saw. i may be the 1st on to have discovered another alien species from the galaxy. either way if my report files or not i know someday. someone will come upon this. may be in 1year or 8 or 20 or 300 or 50,000 years but someday someone will rediscover this and everyone will see i was right.
content.summary: A ufo with black with blue lights a white ufo with different color lights with blue and orange light/fame stuff coming from the bottom. grey/lead alien/robot thing with stick body

content.detailedDescription: was going to local supermarket to buy bottled water for my daughter, as i was reaching top of frederick street towards old fritztown road saw a white bright blinking orb moving upwards from east to west. proceeded to stop at intersection and observe object which looked like it was trying to hide in dark clouds to my left then lost sight of it.
content.summary: Driving up frederick street towards old fritzstown road observed a round, white blinking orb move across mt front view . it was ascending weirdly towards the dark clouds on my right, it was not a plane,helicopter or anything similar

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

first of all i apologize for my poor english.
i found the attached picture in our family album, i already forgot about it.

we've been on holiday in corfu, greece at this time. a day before of our last day i tried to catch the sunrise with my camera from the hotel's room's lodge, so i made some test photos to make sure, that i can make the best picture when it's time. i used the automatic and multi-shot mode. in this mode the camera makes 5 pics in total, with 0,5 sec delay between the shots.
our hotel was located only 200 meters from the seaside.

so i pushed the button... and like others in many other cases i did not see anything in the air. but at home on my laptop i recognized the semi-transparent object on the left hand side of the picture. it cannot be a bird, a plane,a planet, a balloon or any known object, because i believe that we do not produce that kind of semi-transparent (air)vehicle. the object was seen only on one picture out of 5. the streetlights were off already and the sun was still under the horizon. on the top of the picture as additional info, which can help you for a better location, the venus shines on the top of the picture, and the land can bee seen in distance is the border zone between greece and albania.

there is also a kind of trail can be seen behind the (air? space?)craft, but i think it is not smoke or heat, but a kind of energytrail.
the object did not make any noise and it wasn't visible for the naked eye.

at the moment i recognized the object on the picture i wasn't shocked, as this is not my first experience with ufos. this case just strenghtened my faith, that of course we are not alone in this giant universe.
content.summary: I tried to catch the sunrise with my camera. i made test shoots a few mins before of the exact time. i cathed this one on one of the pics.

content.detailedDescription: Please call.
content.summary: One appeared, waited for a few seconds then another appeared the joined up and headed south side by side then split and both vanished into thin air, clocked. there is much more, please ge ahold of us

content.detailedDescription: I was out swimming with my kids at my house.And i spotted a bright light moving smoothly headed north. then it just went out and there was nothing no sound or aircraft lights seemed to just vanish. i just looked up to the sky and spotted it. at first i thought the craft was a helicopter but there was no noise. bright white light like an orb moving slow and smooth over the area. i felt a little panicked and then got myself and kids out of the pool and went inside. i didnt lose sight it just turned the lights off i guess there was no shimmer or distortion of any kind. like i said it just vanished.
content.summary: There was a bright light moving smoothly across the sky then it just went out and there was no sound or aircraft lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north to pick up dinner when i looked up into the sky and saw four huge lights moving east at a very slow speed.  the lights were at a very low elevation and turned very quickly.  they then disappeared.  i witnessed some black helicopters around the site while i was driving home.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed four huge lights in a boomerang formation, turned suddenly then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was walking along powers drive orlando florida, when i decide to snap pics of the sun as it pertrude from behind the cloud, i point my phone cam in direction of the sun snap twice look at it for clarity and there it was right there in one pic and not the other. it was clear to me there is an anomaly and it's an orb.I could not see it with my naked eyes so i can't say what it was doing but from the looks of the pic it's hovering, i felt the same after realizing what i'm looking at, took a few more pics and it was gone.
content.summary: Strolling to cornerstone decide to snap the rising sun.

content.detailedDescription: Wasn't much more than a month ago that i saw orbs... and have felt pretty lucky to see that.  a friend i was with also witnessed this.  since then, needless to say, both of us have been sky watching quite a bit more than usual.  about a week ago, my friend came back over with binoculars and told me to look closely at this star.  at least, it seemed like a star.. but it was flashing red and blue and i think white.. but the flashes were so sequential.. it did not seem random at all.  could not quite make out what it was... really, it had looked like a star.. but a big star.. but have not seen it in the sky since.  i looked up star strobing colors on google and was surprised to find quite a few people reporting this, going back to about 2010.  perhaps there were some even earlier than that.  but some people described it like a disco ball... and yes, it could have been described like that.  i am not saying it is a ufo, but i have never seen a star do that.  i know that stars can scintillate colors.. but this looked more like a strobe... or a cop's lights when they pull you over!!!  could this be some sort of satellite or drone?  i just don't know.. but i am sure keeping my eyes on the sky.  of all the reports i have read about such a star like thing, i haven't read any definitive answers as to what it might be!  i watched this star a good 15 minutes, then came in and went to bed.  the next night it was not there.  it had been completely stationary  (that would not be the case if it was a satellite, would it?)  if it moved, i sure didn't detect any movement.. other than the strobing lights.  i would love to hear some feedback on this.  any of you skywatchers out there... check out the stars with binoculars.. and see if you can see anything like this.  i hope it comes back.  it occurs to me that these things could be revealing themselves to certain people.. who are open to it.. because i have noticed many people who have seen a ufo have, in many cases, seen others later on, as well.  what are the odds of that happening?  i mean, yes, once you have seen something, you tend to look at the sky more than before.. but still.. for people to see, not one, but two, three, four.... either they are very fortunate... or hallucinating, right?  always love, twister
content.summary: Looked like sky cop pulling someone over (lights)

content.detailedDescription: Bluewhite oval  moving south at above space station speed
content.summary: Bluewhite oval  moving south at above space station speed

content.detailedDescription: On 6/28/15 at approximately 1300 hours, i walked out my front door onto my porch and sat in my chair which faces north. as i looked up i saw a black object in the sky moving slowly. there was no wind here during that time. it seemed to travel nw from the north. and then it stopped and was stationary. after about a total time of a minute and a half it just diappeard. i knew what i was looking at wasnt anything i had ever seen before. i was in awe. in noticed if you enlarge the object in the photo, that i took, it appears to have white aura and messed up pixels. a friend of mine said i should report it. so, here i am. thank you
content.summary: When i first noticed the ufo it wass traveling it seemed from north to northwest. then it stopped nw. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: It was berwwen 1025-1030 pm....I had just backed my car out of the garage..When i noticed it....It was a bright reddish orange...It looked like it was cruising about 30mph..Well it was moving slower then a plane would...It was traveling  in a n. or ne direction....It looked like it would stop then move then stop then move..As if it wanted me to follow it....So i headed in the direction of where i saw it...But it disappeared into the clouds just before i could get out in the open....From where i was...
content.summary: It was just below cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
I was just taking a cool picture of the moon.  42 6'16" n 87 54'1"
at exactly 8:58ct.  i did not notice the ufo in the upper right corner of the photo till i looked at the picture from my iphone6.  i was too focused on how neat the moon looked from my perspective.  just interesting.  that light has been no where to be seen since the picture sighting.
content.summary: After taking a picture of the moon with no flash i captured a picture of a ufo in the upper right side of the picture.  42 6'16" n 87 54'1"

content.detailedDescription: While floating in lake tahoe off shore around 100 yards waiting to dive. myself and about 4 other divers looked up in the blue sky watching a plane contrail flying very high. i spotted a oddly white bright star slowly moving a great distance above the contrail. this object was moving from the west to the northwest. this object was very very high. we also noticed that it being morning time, this object was white-bright like. no other stars or moon was seen in the sky. i would like to know what it was?
content.summary: Bright star moving seen during daylight

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Star gazing in the yard at the time. 
amateur telescope viewer and nightly sky watcher.
1st noticed the objects incredible silent speed.
i instantly thought ufo as i've been able to research all of my previous nightly encounters to date and have been able to dis/prove all of them within a few weeks.
i will not pursue any investigation to this as the answer is clear as to what i saw, however you may enlighten me.

large, silent, hazy, white light of oval/elongated shape moving in a straight line from the nnw to the sse at a very high rate of speed east of sand lake mi. the shape seriously reminded me of the typical "saucer on a string" from the 1960's movies.
i adjusted my position away from tree line interference and the object went into a weaving/bobbing pattern in the se, similar to what someone with a laser can do and at that speed but not distance or size. 
again, this is at high speed and a larger light than i've ever seen in the sky. 
i readjusted my position again to confirm what i was seeing.
after 3-4 minutes total, i lost the object to the horizon or possibly clouds.
the weather was partly cloudy however the sky was clear in the area where i first noticed the object.
i reacted like it was an everyday event as i am surprised it took me this long to see an unexplainable object due to my love of the sky.
i reported it to nufo almost instantly. sorry about the delay with you. 
approximate time of event was 12:50 a.M. 9/19/2015.
content.summary: Large object. fast, silent, hazy white light.Straight line then massive path changes.

content.detailedDescription: I observed a gray object in the photographs as i started to look at each shot. the object seamed to be rough or bumpy in surface and apeared to almost have a mushroom shape as it rotated showing all sides over the course of an hour.  the shape apeared to move to different positions in a circle pattern.  i took roughly ten photographs of this object.  in several of the photographs i noticed holes or designs in the object and in one of the shots i saw what looks like a badge shape or definate shape on what apeared to be the back side of the object. the object seamed to have a face like shape at times then would change it's rotation and then look like a craft or rock type object with a bumpy surface yet it had very pronounced surface eliments as if it was shape shifting. i waited until a day or two to download the photographs. i did shoot the blood moon the fallowing day and did not capture and object in those pictures.  i have included five of the images. in these photographs you can see a small circle near the moon images, this is the object at hand.  if enlarged, you can see the changes in shape as discussed in these five images. the object did seam to emit an ora around it even though the moon was in clear view and the moon did not emit a ring or ora itself. i conclude that what i saw was an actual solid object in the area.
content.summary: On the night of september 27, 2015 i decided to take photographs of the full moon prior to the next days blood moon eclipse.

content.detailedDescription: Whilst driving home approximately 2 miles east of the village of glencoe me and my friend noticed what firstly appeared to be a very bright white light heading west towards us at a rather slow speed i found this strange as it is not an aircraft flight path so we assumed it was a helicopter but as we continued to approach each other the one white light soon became three in the shape of a perfect triangle at this point we new this was no helicopter as it continued towards us at a steady pace the three light intensified in brightness almost blinding i then stopped my vehicle with mountains on both sides of me in close proximity and i started to flash my headlight constantly and we both put our windows down and could hear no sound but as i continued to flash my lights the craft was now almost overhead stopped and made an unbelievable left turn not a sweeping turn the now visibly triangular craft dark in color turned on the spot and headed off north the three white lights went of and three dimmer red lights started to flash and it unfortunately disappeared out of our site due to the close proximity of the mountains i would like to add the sky's were clear and a bright full moon was visible and its shape was easily identified on the moonlit sky i can categorically say this was no aircraft i have ever seen making such manouvers with no sound i would estimate it was roughly two to three hundred feet up and each side roughly eighty to a hundred feet my friend said it was if they seen us stopped to look and turned away from us quite unbelievable if i hadn't seen it with my own eyes
content.summary: Triangular craft dark with 3 high intensity white lights on each corner

content.detailedDescription:
Right by the beach in brigantine over the ocean. i have been seeing these balls of fire-like orbs flying back and forth in the night sky. making no sound what-so-ever. the fact that they make no sound to me is the surprising point of interest. because soon after watching them after a while. they would morph, or shape shift into a light pattern similar to a conventional aircraft/possible helicopter. flashing red and white lights. still, i repeat, appearing to make no sound. they do not appear to have any shape that i can make out other then round balls of fire. they would also from time to time dematerialize, or fade out, and at times glow brighter or dim down. the residents here do not seem to pay much attention or be interested in them. they do not seem to be surprised or in shock of what is occurring or they may not be able to see them at all, which i have studied is highly possible for some to see, and others not. on one occasion, during the super blue moon eclipse on august29th of this year. which btw is my birthday. they were everywhere, flying around as if they were normal aircraft. but balls of fire are not normal aircraft. i have a few video clips of them, though i used my smart phone camera to capture the video and did not get a great video. keep in mind when i say them, there were more then one, but i was only able to capture one on film, though i do have other video files of other sightings of the same objects from earlier dates. i plan on purchasing a camera soon so i may hopefully catch a better glimpse of them for future evidence that can be more easily & professionally debunked. 

the manner of which the sightings as follows: i had pointed down on my calendar the day of the super moon so that i may see it with my father. as we waited for the moon to rise into view, we watched the moon together for a few minutes. i decided to get a better view so i rode my bike a block down to the beach. moments later the orbs appeared. i stood there in excitement for a few minutes then rushed back to my fathers apartment where i was initially before the sighting, to show my father and see if he could see it as well. sure enough he was able to see it, so i pulled out my camera, and began to film from my cell phone. i then rushed back down to the beach to see if i could get a better view, then suddenly when i arrived, it had morphed into what appears to be some sort of man made aircraft. which also made no sound.    

i will send the video files of the or before and after the morph below. thank you. 

i plan on becoming a member of mufon. for i have been studying this subject for over 10yrs. and have seen, experienced and witnessed multiple sightings, as well as physical contacts of the 5th kind. i have a long huge story. and i wish to share this with the world when i am ready. thank you for making this happen for all of us, and i support you guys 110%.
content.summary: Shape shifting contained pulsating fire ball

content.detailedDescription: At american legion in mcminnville,or saw light in sky to my sw about a mile or so away did not thinkmuch about it at time saw it again the next night at same time ofevening 8:30pm no noise gone when i came back out about one half hour later
content.summary: Saw light in sky hoveringalso saw on 24 at sametime in evening

content.detailedDescription: Driving in boat at lake wallenpaupack. passenger looking up at sky notice 4 orange/red glowing lights merge from over mountain. brought objects to my attention. the where flying in different formations. they where coming in our direction. a 5th one showed up off some ways to the right of the others. the 4 all merged together and shot off behind the clouds to the west. the 5th one followed. we keep looking to see if they would appear from the clouds again, but never did. bright brilliant red/orange objects. no blinking lights, or red green lights as on a regular craft. the where round circular shap like. passenger wheat for camera, but battery was dead. not time to retrieve mine and was driving the boat at low speed and it was dark. sun set around this time is 7:00. there was a moon out and partly cloudy that night.
content.summary: 4 in formations merged together and took of in west direction 5th one did not merge and seemed to follow same direction
